Package org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.command.flag

package org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.command.flag
This package contains classes related to parsing command flags.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.command
    This package contains the classes that manages command handling.
    org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.command.context
     
    org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.command.flags
    This package contains predefined flags for commands.
    org.mvplugins.multiverse.core.command.queue
    Manager queuing of dangerous commands in need of confirmation.

    Class
    Description
    CommandFlag
    Represents a flag.
    CommandFlag.Builder<S extends CommandFlag.Builder<?>>
    A builder for a flag.
    CommandFlagGroup
    A group of flags.
    CommandFlagGroup.Builder
    A builder for CommandFlagGroup.
    CommandFlagsManager
    Manages all the flag groups and parsing.
    CommandFlagsParser
    Parses flags from a string array.
    CommandValueFlag<T>
    Represents a flag with a value.
    CommandValueFlag.Builder<T,S extends CommandValueFlag.Builder<T,S>>
    A builder for a flag.
    CommandValueFlag.EnumBuilder<T extends Enum<T>,S extends CommandValueFlag.EnumBuilder<T,S>>
    Specific builder for a flag with enum value.
    FlagBuilder
    Builds and registers a flag group on initialization.
    ParsedCommandFlags
    Object to contain the results of the flags present and its values.
